channel.title: Tdd on Dirk Groot
channel.description: Recent content in Tdd on Dirk Groot

item.title: Robot Worlds 4: End to end
item.description: <summary class="dg-summary"> I feel like we’re almost done with our walking skeleton. Today, I’ll try to finish it. </summary>

item.title: Robot Worlds 3: Client
item.description: <summary class="dg-summary"> Now that we have a server that can receive a request over TCP, handle it and send a response back, it looks like a good time to start working on the client. We’ll also think about how we want to test our walking skeleton end-to-end. </summary>

item.title: Robot Worlds 2: Communication
item.description: <summary class="dg-summary"> Our walking skeleton is no more than an undead skull at the moment. Some more bones need to be added to make it a fully fledged skeleton. Let’s see if we can set up communication between the client and the server. </summary>

item.title: Robot Worlds 1: Walking Skeleton
item.description: <summary class="dg-summary"> Let’s make a game! I have a big graveyard of unfinished hobby projects, so I have no idea how far I’ll get. But as long as learning ensues, I’m fine with that. </summary>
